about_the_game:
Expansion Pack for Z3TA+ 2. Requires Z3TA+ 2 which is available separately.

Digital Sound Factory Wave Scapes Expansion Pack explores the power of the Z3TA+2 synthesizers amazing wave shaping algorithms. Wave shaping parameters are programed to allow instant control over the waveforms harmonic characteristics using the modulation wheel, X-Y pad, velocity, and aftertouch. Wave Scapes also includes auto shaping programs synced to LFO’s that morph sound waves rendering amazing new sonic textures. Sound categories consist of Synthesizers, Keyboards, Leads, Pads, Textures, Basses, Arpeggios, and Sequences. Included are 270 programs, new waveforms, and MIDI sequences. Take control of your sound with DSF’s Z3TA+2 Wave Scapes.

Digital Sound Factory Wave Scapes Expansion Pack explores the power of the Z3TA+2 synthesizers amazing wave shaping algorithms. Wave Scapes also includes auto shaping programs synced to LFO’s that morph sound waves rendering amazing new sonic textures. Sound categories consist of Synthesizers, Keyboards, Leads, Pads, Textures, Basses, Arpeggios, and Sequences. Included are 270 programs, new waveforms, and MIDI sequences. name: Z3TA+ 2 - DSF Wave Scapes Expansion Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom Quad Core 9750 2.4 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card that can display 1280x800 minimum screen resolution
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO or WDM compatible sound device recommended
  • Additional Notes: Expansion Pack for Z3TA+ 2. Requires Z3TA+ 2 which is available separately.

Wave shaping parameters are programed to allow instant control over the waveforms harmonic characteristics using the modulation wheel, X-Y pad, velocity, and aftertouch.
